name: BOO BLINKO - Halloween Plinko Puzzle Adventure
name_original: BOO BLINKO - Halloween Plinko Puzzle Adventure
description:
BOO BLINKO -

Halloween Styled PLINKO Pachinko Game!

Drop the 14 different BLINKO BALLS and gain points through over 250 different levels!

BEWARE of the BOMBS!



YOU have already played BLINK-O!

Welcome to the HALLOWEEN EDITION of BLINK-O!

250 NEW EXCITING BLINK-O LEVELS!

5 NEW HALLOWEEN CHARACTERS!

PUMPKIN - GHOST - SPIDER - JACK - CREATURE

TRY IT IF YOU DARE!
